Text.Page:
These blasted {@LinkCreature:3#1#stonebeak scavengers} keep pestering us. It's not so much that they're dangerous as they're a distraction we don't need here in Blood Run.

Do me a favor, get out there and kill those wretches and bring me their tail feathers. We can always use more quills.
Nice work. That'll help us focus on keeping the devas contained here. We just can't afford to let them break through to Lumbertown.
Don't worry. They're harmless. Well, mostly harmless. Go get 'em.
